info.name: Janrain Flow Configuration API
info.description: For use when working with the Flow Configuration component of Registration which includes names, versions, fields, forms, screens, locales, translations, mail templates, and userData.

request.description:
Returns a list of flows.


Parameters:

Returns the current version of the flow.


Parameters:

flow: The flow name.

Updates/replaces userData object and/or entityTypes in the flow. userData lists the schema attributes to store in the janrainCaptureProfileData object in Local Storage for a logged-in user.


Parameters:

flow: The flow name.

Creates a new flow by copying an existing flow. The name attribute in the
request specifies the name of the new flow.  This endpoint cannot be used to overwrite an existing flow. 


Parameters:

Returns a list of all versions for a particular flow, along with a change note for each version.


Parameters:

Returns the version of the flow.


Parameters:

version:

Restores flow to version


Parameters:

version:

Returns a list of fields defined in the flow.


Parameters:

Adds a field to the flow. The `schemaAttribute` must be a dot-separated
path to an existing schema attribute. Call the
[schemas endpoint](#/registration/{app}/schemas/{schema}) for a list
of valid attributes.


Parameters:

Returns a field definition from the flow. Includes validations.


Parameters:

field: The field name.

Updates/replaces a field in the flow.


Parameters:

field: The field name.

Removes a field from the flow. Also removes the field from any forms that were
using it.


Parameters:

field: The field name.

Returns a list of fields defined in the flow. Alias of
`/config/{app}/flows/{flow}/fields`.


Parameters:

Adds a field to the flow. Works just like
`/config/{app}/flows/{flow}/fields/{field}` except translatable values are
accepted in the locale specified. The `schemaAttribute` must be a dot-
separated path to an existing schema attribute. Call the [schemas
endpoint](#/registration/{app}/schemas/{schema}) for a list of valid
attributes.


Parameters:

Returns a field definition from the flow translated into the locale specified. Includes validations.


Parameters:

field:

Updates/replaces a field in the flow.


Parameters:

field:

Returns a list of forms in the flow.


Parameters:

Returns a list of fields in a form.


Parameters:

form: The form name.

Updates/replaces the list of fields and features in the form.
Any fields added to the form must already exist in the flow.


Parameters:

form: The form name.

Returns a dictionary of all screens for a flow.


Parameters:

Returns a list of information for a specific screen in a flow.


Parameters:

screen: The screen name.

Updates the modal value for a screen in a flow. Requires 'modal' value as True/False and 'name' of a valid screen name. '_self' path is optional.


Parameters:

screen: The screen name.

Returns a list of locales that are available.


Parameters:

Returns the translation values for a locale.


Parameters:

locale:

Returns a dictionary of all translations.


Parameters:

Updates existing translations. This endpoint does not delete data.


Parameters:

Adds new translation strings to the translations dictionary. You must supply a
list of values for each locale defined in the flow. For a list of locales,
call
[/config/{app}/flows/{flow}/locales](#/config/{app}/flows/{flow}/locales).


Parameters:

Returns a dictionary of all translations for a key.


Parameters:

key:

Returns a list of all email templates in the specified locale.


Parameters:

Returns a single email template in the specified locale.


Parameters:

template:

body.raw:
{ "subject": "Verify your email", "textBody": "Welcome to {*#settings*}{*&site_name*}{*/settings*}, {*#user*}{*&displayName*}{*/user*}! To complete your new registration, just click on or browse to the URL below to verify this email address. {*&email_verification_url*} ", "htmlBody": "

Welcome to {*#settings*}{*&site_name*}{*/settings*}, {*#user*}{*&displayName*}{*/user*}! To complete your new registration, just click on or browse to the URL below to verify this email address.

{*email_verification_url*}

" }

request.description:
Update a single email template in the specified locale.


Parameters:

template:

Returns the body for this email template in the specified locale.


Parameters:

body.raw:
Welcome to {*#settings*}{*&site_name*}{*/settings*}, {*#user*}{*&displayName*}{*/user*}! To complete your new registration, just click on or browse to the URL below to verify this email address.

{*email_verification_url*}

request.description:
Update the body for this email template in the specified
locale. The `Content-Type` header determines whether the
text or html version is updated.


Parameters:

Returns the subject for this email template in the specified locale.


Parameters:

Update the subject for this email template in the specified locale.


Parameters:
